author: szetszwo
msg: Merge r1414874 and r1414878 from trunk for HDFS-3495. Update Balancer to support new NetworkTopology with NodeGroup.

author: szetszwo
msg: svn merge -c 1357442 from trunk for HDFS-3601. Add BlockPlacementPolicyWithNodeGroup to support block placement with 4-layer network topology.

author: szetszwo
msg: svn merge -c 1353807 from trunk for HDFS-3498. Support replica removal in BlockPlacementPolicy and make BlockPlacementPolicyDefault extensible for reusing code in subclasses.
